name: Drömjobbet i Rosemond Valley
storyline: Josephine is asked by her uncle to modernize the family department store Rosemond's. If she is up to the task of making the 100th anniversary a success, he will hand the future responsibility to her. In addition to opening and decorating new shops, she has to keep good relationship with all employees. They have lots of tips, but behind their facades lurks also other interests. We have to think about what makes customers feel at home - shows and advertising can entice them to want to buy even more! If Josephine is not successful, Uncle Hugo will assign responsibility to someone else. How you choose to run your department will be critical for Josephine's ultimate goal - to operate Rosemond's in the future!
summary: In this business game the player plays as Josephine who is given the task to run her own mall.
